Question: Shenzhen Csip Science & Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen CSIP Science & Technology Co., Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Specializes in design, R&D, and manufacturing of small size soft package Li-polymer batteries
- Offers high-quality rechargeable Li-polymer cells and integrated solutions
- Employs experienced quality control and technical personnel
- Operates in an area of 20,000 square meters with a daily output of 200,000-300,000 Li-polymer batteries and 60,000-100,000 assembled batteries
- Certified by ISO9001, ISO14001, OHSAS18001, UL, CE, KC, PSE, CB, RoHS, and more
- Provides personalized high-end customized services
- Offers a range of batteries including high rate LiPo, lithium polymer battery pack, and lithium-ion battery
- Ensures battery quality through pre-production samples and final inspection
- Provides OEM services and supports sample orders
- Offers various shipping options including DHL, UPS, FedEx, TNT, air, and sea

For more information, contact Zoe, Carol, or Phily at 0086-0755-84877686.
Summary_cn:
深圳创思雅普科技有限公司

CES 2024产品亮点：

- 专注于小尺寸软包Li聚合物电池的设计、研发和制造
- 提供高质量的可充电Li聚合物电池和集成解决方案
- 雇用经验丰富的质量控制和技术人员
- 占地面积20000平方米，日产量可达20-30万个Li聚合物电池和6-10万个组装电池
- 通过ISO9001、ISO14001、OHSAS18001、UL、CE、KC、PSE、CB、RoHS等认证
- 提供个性化高端定制服务
- 提供多种电池产品，包括高倍率LiPo电池，聚合物电池组和锂离子电池
- 通过生产前样品和最终检验确保电池质量
- 提供OEM服务，支持样品订单
- 提供DHL、UPS、FedEx、TNT、航空和海运等多种运输选择

如需更多信息，请联系Zoe、Carol或Phily，电话0086-0755-84877686。
